name: The Arts in Qatar
long_desc: This course will examine the arts in Qatar, both historically and in the present. We will focus especially on art exhibits and musical events scheduled by the citys museums and concert halls during the Spring 2020 semester. The curriculum will derive from the artistic presentations themselves, which will provide a springboard for reading assignments and research papers in the history of music and art. We will also examine the historical development of cultural institutions in Qatar.

custom_fields.goals: Students will become active citizens who participate in cultural life.
custom_fields.key_topics: The course will examine the arts in Qatar, both historically and in the present.
custom_fields.assessment_structure: Active reading, book reports, a research paper, and a journal of cultural events.
custom_fields.relevance: Students will learn about cultural life in Qatar.
custom_fields.learning_resources: The "curriculum" will derive from the artistic presentations themselves, which will provide a springboard for reading assignments and research papers in the history of music and art.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Availability to attend musical events and art exhibits on several evening
